Message.Title: gop wants to end medicare
Message.Msg: everyone knows the gop is out to kill medicare, even some republicans say so. Republican Campaigns Against Republican Budget: ‘It Harms The Medicare Program Seniors Rely On’ By Travis Waldron on Jun 22, 2012 at 9:31 am In an effort to paint himself as an independent who doesn’t always toe the party line, Montana Rep. Denny Rehberg (R) is touting his opposition to the House Republican budget in an ad released by the Montana Republican party. Rehberg, who is running to unseat Sen. Jon Tester (D), voted against the GOP’s budget plan for the second consecutive year because of its draconian cuts to Medicare and Medicaid. The ad mentions multiple votes on which Rehberg bucked his party before adding that he “refused to support a Republican budget plan that could harm the Medicare programs so many of Montana’s seniors rely on”:

Message.Title: Treasury Signs FATCA Agreement with 5 European Countries
Message.Msg: The Treasury Department released a model intergovernmental agreement Thursday for implementing the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, developed in consultation with France, Germany, Italy, Spain and the United Kingdom. FATCA was included as part of the HIRE Act of 2010 and requires foreign financial institutions to disclose the holdings of U.S. depositors to the IRS as a way to spur tax compliance. http://www.accountingtoday.com/news/treasury-signs-fatca-agreement-uk-france-germany-spain-italy-63416-1.html

Topic.Title: Yes George, America DOES miss you!

Message.Msg: The Illuminati are seeking a "New World Oder". Sounds more like George Soros and his "Open Society" than Glenn Beck who is seeking a New Great [Spiritual] Awakening. Per Wikipedia: The Illuminati (plural of Latin illuminatus, "enlightened") is a name given to several groups, both real (historical) and fictitious. Historically the name refers to the Bavarian Illuminati, an Enlightenment-era secret society founded on May 1, 1776. In more modern contexts the name refers to a purported conspiratorial organization which is alleged to mastermind events and control world affairs through governments and corporations to establish a New World Order. In this context the Illuminati are usually represented as a modern version or continuation of the Bavarian Illuminati. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illuminati

Topic.Title: Nixon allowed McGovern to win one state.

Message.Msg: That's not a "dropkick." That's a poof from a poof poof. Nixon was one of our most liberal Presidents. (Started EPA and OSHA among others.) He was always deluded into thinking that if he did liberal things the liberals would love him. But the liberals hated him because he was Republican. Liberals hate because they are haters. It's part of their "progressive" (vile) nature! Democrats also hated Nixon because he won in Vietnam. (The Democrats threw the win away two years later. Betrayed four millions of Asians to the communists and death. Then blamed Nixon and claimed the war was unwinnable.) The Liberals still play up Watergate as though it was the biggest breach in democratic process in the history of our republic. But that could only be true in McGovern had some hope of winning in 1972. And McGovern had no hope and no chance of winning. He was a Liberal failure. (Failure is a constant theme among Progressives, Liberals, Democrats.) After Watergate, it was also said that if every person who SAID they voted for McGovern ,in 1972, had actually voted for him, McGovern would have won handily. But the fact is, most of the public (conservative, centrist and liberal) recognized that McGovern was a failure! Just as they now recognize that Obama is a failure. DUMP OBAMA AND HIS BAND OF COMMIE FASCISTS IN NOVEMBER 2012!
